reviews.review_msg: rem 202W with Scott was a NIGHTMARE but he made up for it by being awesome in 375 and 388 and 311. If you can scrape and grind and cry through 202w you will love him in other classes.

His lectures are insightful, relevant and informative and he has a sense of dry humor that I appreciate. However: This course was a condensed online offering and there was a lot of lecture material to chew through. Made studying hard because there was no practice problems and you could only do labour-intensive review to prepare for finals
